Name: Deep Space Dash
About the game: Deep Space Dash 2.0 is a 3rd/1st futuristic space runner that will challenge your focus and dexterity. You are a convict in an intergalactic high-security prison, at an unknown location. casual spacey infinite runner game that will challenge you quite a bit. 2.0 update removed modes, added achievements, changed complete game overall. features: - 1st/3rd person camera view - transformation tile (allow destroying blockers for some time) - fuel instead of time - shield mechanic - achievements - new environment
